bibl.title: The Legend of Alexander the Great on Greek and Roman Coins.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Images of Alexander: A survey of Alexander's image on ancient coins. - 2. Man, king, hero and god: Alexander's changing portraits. - 3. Making good use of a legend. - 4. Excursus: Alexander in disguise. - Conclusion: Perspectives and limitations. - Notes. Plate section (text and images). - Description of coins illustrated. Select Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: DAHMEN Karsten, The Legend of Alexander the Great on Greek and Roman Coins.
London - New York, Routledge, 2007, 8°, xi-179 pp., nombr. reproductions de monnaies, 3 cartes. ISBN 0-415-39451-1 (hbk) / 0-415-39452-X (pbk). £60 (hbk) / £19.99 (pbk).

Introduction. - 1. Images of Alexander: A survey of Alexander's image on ancient coins. - 2. Man, king, hero and god: Alexander's changing portraits. - 3. Making good use of a legend. - 4. Excursus: Alexander in disguise. - Conclusion: Perspectives and limitations. - Notes. Plate section (text and images). - Description of coins illustrated. Select Bibliography. Index.
